p: Ribavirin that binds to the active site on RdRp has been used for years as components of treatment for hepatitis C [ 55], has broad-spectrum activities against viruses including MERS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 [ 51, 52]; it can influence the dosage of anticoagulants and can also influence the activity of P2Y12 inhibitors through the inhibition of CYP3A4, which results in a reduction of the serum concentrations of the active metabolites of and increased serum concentrations [ 56].
